we designed this headband pattern for you squishy brioche stitches make for a cosy accessory that s as functional as it is stylish keep your ears toasty warm this season learn to knit brioche on a small manageable project the northwind headband is worked in brioche stitch worked flat the headband begins and ends with a stockinette tube to complete the project you ll twist this tube and graft
